snippet: Years after selling his label, the fashion designer Helmut Lang prepares for his first New York art show.
abstract: Fashion designer Helmut Lang, who sold his label and quit the business in 2004, has reinvented himself as a visual artist; is preparing for his first art show in New York, which will open in Greenwich Village.
lead_paragraph: Years after selling his label, the fashion designer Helmut Lang prepares for his first New York art show.

headline.seo: Helmut Lang Prepares an Art Exhibition
headline.main: A Seamless Transition From Fashion to Art
headline.print_headline: A Seamless Transition From Fashion to Art
